com.android.common.contacts

Class DataUsageStatUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.common.contacts.DataUsageStatUpdater

  • public class DataUsageStatUpdater
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenient class for updating usage statistics in ContactsProvider. Applications like Email, Sms, etc. can promote recipients for better sorting with this class
    See Also:
    ContactsContract.Contacts

      Copied from API in ICS (not available before it).

      boolean updateWithAddress(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> addresses)
      Update usage statistics information using a list of email addresses.
      boolean updateWithPhoneNumber(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> numbers)
      Update usage statistics information using a list of phone numbers.
      boolean updateWithRfc822Address(java.util.Collection<java.lang.CharSequence> texts)
      Updates usage statistics using comma-separated RFC822 address like "Joe , Due ".

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataUsageStatUpdater

    • Method Detail

      • updateWithRfc822Address

        public boolean updateWithRfc822Address(java.util.Collection<java.lang.CharSequence> texts)
        Updates usage statistics using comma-separated RFC822 address like "Joe , Due ". This will cause Disk access so should be called in a background thread.
        Returns:
        true when update request is correctly sent. False when the request fails, input has no valid entities.

      • updateWithAddress

        public boolean updateWithAddress(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> addresses)
        Update usage statistics information using a list of email addresses. This will cause Disk access so should be called in a background thread.
        Returns:
        true when update request is correctly sent. False when the request fails, input has no valid entities.
        See Also:
        update(Collection, Collection, String)

      • updateWithPhoneNumber

        public boolean updateWithPhoneNumber(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> numbers)
        Update usage statistics information using a list of phone numbers. This will cause Disk access so should be called in a background thread.
        Returns:
        true when update request is correctly sent. False when the request fails, input has no valid entities.
        See Also:
        update(Collection, Collection, String)
